Title: The Age of Steel (2)
Plot:
Location: A parallel Earth
Date: 1st/2nd February, 2007
Enemy: John Lumic, Cyber-Controller, The Cybermen

The plans of John Lumic to convert the world into Cybermen are now in full force. The Tenth Doctor, Rose, Mickey and the Preachers must find a way to stop him from enforcing his "ultimate upgrade."
ParentalRatingReason: PG Some scenes may scare very young children
GuestStars: Camille Coduri, Noel Clarke, Paul Kasey, Nicholas Briggs, Shaun Dingwall, Don Warrington, Jules Bert, Andrew Hayden Smith, Duncan Duff, Helen Griffin, Roger Lloyd-Pack, Colin Spaull
